title: OAuth Login Success
description: Verify that users can log in successfully using OAuth with valid credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Initiate OAuth login flow
Provide valid OAuth credentials
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to dashboard

title: OAuth Login Failure
description: Check system behavior when OAuth login fails due to invalid credentials or cancellation.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Initiate OAuth login flow
Supply invalid credentials or cancel login
Verify appropriate error message is shown and user is not logged in

title: Client CRUD Operations
description: Verify Create, Read, Update and Delete operations for client management including multi-address and contact associations.

steps.description: Create a new client with basic details, multiple addresses and contacts
Verify client is saved with all details correctly
Edit the client details and update contact information
Verify updates are saved and displayed properly
Delete the client
Verify client no longer exists in the client list

title: Schedule Service with Team Allocation and Conflict Prevention
description: Test scheduling a service order ensuring team availability and conflict prevention workflows.

steps.description: Select or register a client
Define service details and schedule timing
System checks team availability and suggests appropriate allocation
Confirm order scheduling
Verify order is created and notification is sent
Attempt to schedule overlapping service with same team
Verify system prevents scheduling conflict and displays error

title: Reschedule Service with Availability Revalidation
description: Verify system behavior when rescheduling service orders including revalidation of team availability and update of history.

steps.description: Select an existing scheduled order
Change service date/time
System revalidates resource and team availability
Confirm rescheduling
Verify schedule is updated and history of changes is saved

title: Cancel Service Order and Record History
description: Verify cancellation process including record update and notification of stakeholders.

steps.description: Select an existing scheduled service order
Initiate order cancellation
System updates order status as cancelled and records cancellation history
Verify notification is sent to relevant users

title: Invoice Creation and Payment Reconciliation
description: Verify invoices can be generated from completed orders, payment marking works, and receipts are issued with PDF export.

steps.description: Complete a service order
Generate invoice from completed order
Verify invoice details correspond to service completion data
Mark invoice as paid
Verify payment is recorded and receipt is generated
Export invoice and receipt to PDF
Verify PDF files are generated accurately with correct data

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that users with different roles (Admin, Operator, Financial, Technical) have access only to permitted features and data.

steps.description: Login as Admin and navigate through all modules
Verify Admin has full access including user management
Login as Operator and attempt to access financial modules
Verify Operator is denied access to financial data
Login as Financial user and attempt to modify service schedules
Verify Financial user cannot modify schedules
Login as Technical user and access team management features
Verify Technical user can view and edit employee skills and availability

title: Generate Reports and Export CSV/PDF
description: Verify monthly and client-based reports can be generated and exported as CSV and PDF files.

steps.description: Navigate to reports section
Generate monthly report
Verify report data is accurate and complete
Export monthly report to CSV and PDF
Verify exported files are correctly formatted and contain expected data
Generate client-based report and export to PDF
Verify client report accuracy and PDF export functionality

title: Chatbot Budget Generation Assistance
description: Validate chatbot functionality to assist users in generating service budgets and interacting with the system.

steps.description: Access chatbot widget in the budgets module
Request a service budget using the chatbot
Verify chatbot responds with correct budget details
Provide invalid or ambiguous input to chatbot
Verify chatbot handles errors gracefully and prompts for clarification

title: System Health Check Endpoint
description: Verify the health check API endpoint returns accurate system status for monitoring.

steps.description: Send a request to the system health check endpoint
Verify response indicates system is operational and performance metrics are included

title: Team Management - Employee Profile and Skill Assignment
description: Test functionality to create, edit employee profiles including skill and availability management.

steps.description: Create a new employee profile with skills and availability
Verify employee information is saved and retrievable
Edit employee skills and adjust availability
Verify updates are accurately reflected in the system
Attempt to allocate employee to a service order matching their skills
Verify automatic allocation respects skills and availability

title: UI Responsiveness and Theme Toggle
description: Verify that the UI is responsive on various device sizes and that the dark/light theme toggle works correctly.

steps.description: Load the main dashboard on desktop, tablet and mobile resolutions
Verify UI layout adjusts appropriately without element overlap or cutoff
Toggle between dark and light themes
Verify the theme changes globally and persists across pages

title: Scheduling Performance Validation
description: Check that the average scheduling time remains under 1 minute under standard network conditions.

steps.description: Initiate scheduling of multiple service orders under normal system load
Measure and verify that scheduling time per order is below one minute on average

title: Page Load Times for Primary Features
description: Ensure that pages for primary features load within 2 seconds under standard network conditions.

steps.description: Navigate to client management, scheduling, invoices, and reports pages
Verify that page load times are under 2 seconds each

title: System Availability Monitoring
description: Verify system uptime meets 99% availability during business hours via health monitoring and logs analysis.

steps.description: Review system health check data and logs during business hours
Confirm system availability is 99% or higher
